title: Remove Branch Link from Development Task Cards
description: As a project manager, I want to remove the Branch link element from Development Task cards so that the interface is simplified and visual clutter is reduced for better user experience.
iWant: to remove the Branch link element from Development Task cards
soThat: the interface is simplified and visual clutter is reduced for better user experience
acceptanceCriteria: Given a Development Task card is displayed, when rendered, then the Branch link element is not visible
Given the card layout is updated, when viewed, then remaining elements maintain proper spacing and alignment
Given the simplified interface, when users interact with cards, then all other functionality remains intact
